remarks: Determine if a ring is a field based on its ideals.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)
statement:
isfldidl.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` K ) $.
isfldidl.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` K ) $.
isfldidl.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
isfldidl.4 $e |- Z = ( GId ` G ) $.
isfldidl.5 $e |- U = ( GId ` H ) $.
isfldidl $p |- ( K e. Fld <-> ( K e. CRingOps /\ U =/= Z /\ ( Idl ` K ) = { { Z } , X } ) ) $.
